website_summaries.verdict: A toasty heated car cushion with more intelligent temperature controls than other options.
pros: Back and bottom heating elements provide full coverage while sitting in the car
Temperature control can be set between 86°F and 140°F
cons: The thin cushion doesn't offer that much in terms of extra padding

customer_reviews.title: NOT CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality. You get what you pay for and this product is proof of that. I bought cheap last winter, they overheated and were always slipping down the seat and bunching up - these don't do that nor do they overheat and burn when I'm wearing denim jeans. I would recommend you pay a bit more and buy these. I like them! Halfway through winter and they work well. So far so good! They don't burn like some other brands. Another update: Used the winter, now going into spring - these are great! Yes, I'd recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome poor man’s seat heater !
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product ! It provides ample heat and very comparable to built in seat heaters. It has a built in timer as well which can be set. My 12 volt lighter turns off automatics after 60 mins so no worries about draining the battery if left on. I installed this on my 2017 F-150 with cloth seats. Non slip and stays in place when exiting the car. Easy install as well and it blends in with my upholstery for a good match. I was going paybfor something cheaper, but overall this was the better fit.
customer_reviews.author: SurfOnH20

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Did not last a year. When I tried to use it again recently, I smelled smoke. I looked down and a bubble was forming at the controller. It just isn't worth the risk of injury to yourself or property. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: N8R

customer_reviews.title: Electric malfunction, fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Be Careful!!! I had this for about a year in a Camry and yesterday I noticed that it was on without me pushing the button. Today it did the same thing and when I went to look at the controller, it burned me it was so hot. I will not buy again. I can't risk this thing.
customer_reviews.author: TsimTsum

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of the Kingleting 12 volt Heated Seat Cushion. They were excellent for the six months we were able to use them. Then all of sudden they stopped working. I would have given this product a little higher stars but the when I contacted the seller I received only an automated email reply asking if I check to see if my cigarette lighter worked. No additional trouble shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: THIS CAUGHT FIRE IN MY TRUCK! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAUGHT FIRE IN MY 4RUNNER! DO NOT BUY! My child was sitting on this on the way to school, just minutes after I dropped her off at school I smelled an AWFUL smell and thought there was a fire outside, after a minute I realized my car was filling with smoke. I turned around and the seat warmer was ON FIRE! It melted the leather seats in my new 4 runner and could have been MUCH WORSE! This had been on for only 30 minutes and it was hot enough to burst into flames.
customer_reviews.author: joel nau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat heater!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a breeze to put on... just connect behind headrest and plug in. It does come with clips to affix it under the seat in front, but I didn't want to use those. My legs hold it down enough, that's why it's leaning forward off of the seat bottom, a little bit. I am sure the clips would curve it to the seat's shape. There are 2 clips included. I have a Fiat 500x and was worried it'd be to big, but it fits perfectly. I like that i's cut out to fit inside the seat design as opposed to overlapping. Hope the pics help. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Musicdoc2008

customer_reviews.title: Very satisifed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this heated seat cover. Of course it is not the same as having a factory installed seat heater that would have cost $700 but for less than $35 it works well and appears just like the picture. After it arrived I decided to buy a second one for my passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: LFM

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1 and it worked but timer feature was not working. It was quickly replaced and it works great! It is not like leather that you can slide off when getting in and out of the car. You may need to butt hop to sit in your seat if you usually slide in. I live in Wisconsin so a warm butt is a happy butt. Great mounting points and if you choose the right color, it will blend right in with your seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roogle

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, warm, & doesn’t slide around!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! It has a rubber bottom so it doesn’t slide around on the seat, even when you are wearing a bulky coat. I have an old Excursion, which is a TALL truck and this stays put. It gets decently warm (I am cold-natured anyway and would love for it to get even warmer), but I believe it gets as warm as anything else available. It is incredibly THIN which is great, because I had my seat exactly how I want it and any extra bulk would have made my seat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ShutterbugWoW

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a year.
customer_reviews.text: Update: after just over 1 year this product stopped working. The wear and tear has been great but that is for nothing as it stopped heating. Not impressed at all at the longevity. Great look and feel to this product. Simple installation and straight forward use. Bought one for my driver seat and will end up with a second for the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Another defective cushion unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for several days but occasionally it turned off by itself WITHOUT using the timer. Today, it was 10F outside when I went to turn it on and it would not start after many attempts. The fuse was not blown as the LED indicator light was still on. I read several reviews before I ordered mine that said some units had bad switches. I wrote to the supplier today and complained about my situation. Hopefully they will replace my cushion or send me a new switch.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Mike

customer_reviews.title: Controls are too fussy
customer_reviews.text: Heat is ok, but the controls are too fussy. It has 4 tiny buttons that are so small and close to each other I have to use my finger nails to press and i have pretty tiny hands. Instead of high and low, the temp can be adjusted from 30 to 60 in steps of 3. This is almost impossible to do while driving without looking down at the tiny controller and buttons and can not be done with gloves on. I try to feel for the buttons and then press it 5 or 10 times without looking, 5 gives me medium and 10 gives me low.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Apple

customer_reviews.title: Remote clicker stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I never tried to put it on high fearing it'd start smoking and burn me and my seat. I did notice that the little remote clicker started looking banged up pretty quickly even though I was careful of how I placed it down. Seemed really cheap to be warning sign so fast. UPDATE: It worked great until the remote started acting up and turning on some days and not at all on others. The remote doesn’t work at all. I got maybe 4 months of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My man loves it!  Fits nicely in a bucket seat - not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.text: My man has a bad back, cervical and lumbar. Got this for him to help alleviate stiffness when we travel to the Boston hospitals for my care. Think I found the perfect one. It's not bulky, heats up nicely with a few different settings, easy to install, and he loves it. He turns it on when he starts the car so it's toasty when he heads to work. He's kind of picky so I was pleasantly surprised when he recommended it to friends. Score!
customer_reviews.author: JUDY GREGORY

customer_reviews.title: Sits well!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of other seat heaters like this and none of them ever stayed in place very well or looked decent in my car, this one does both! Also heats up really quickly and can get really warm. My biggest complaints are that the cord isn't super long after routing it through the back of my seat, it is just barely long enough to plug in to my center console and have the remote part still accessible, and it doesn't automatically turn on when given power like most other seat heaters I have had, you have to press the power button on the remote. Not a big deal at all, just the little things.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: The best feature about this seat heater is that it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The best feature about this seat heater is that it doesn't slide at all when getting in or out of the car. Heating is good and fast enough. There are 20 settings but I don't get the feel that there is actually 20 differences in heat. I would have preferred to have low/med/high instead of 15 button pushes between high and low. It also seems kind of funny that the timer settings are 1 hour increments from 1-12 hours. Who is going to set their heater to turn off after 12 hours? Even with these minor oddities, this is the best seat heater I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TN Rupp

customer_reviews.title: The kindest gift you can give to yourself or a friend
customer_reviews.text: I got this a couple of weeks ago because my car doesn't have heated seats (unlike the one I used to have) and on cold mornings it takes a long time for the engine to warm up enough to heat the car. This heated seat cushion is great. It is simple to install (less than 5 minutes) and it works perfectly. I don't know how other brands work, but this is easy to use and it stays in place when getting in and out of the seat. It saved me hundreds compared to a custom job.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rither

customer_reviews.title: Unplug it!
customer_reviews.text: This seat heater works great. Gets warmer than most factory installed ones and fits well. The reason for the 4 stars is that if you leave it plugged in overnight and your vehicle will charge when turned off, it will drain your battery. Just make sure to unplug it from the charge port when the car is off. Otherwise works as expected and fits an 02 Denali well.
customer_reviews.author: jody t

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy, reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect purchasing a (Chinese?) brand. Many reviews claimed it burnt holes in their seats or clothing, and the wired remote would easily break. I’ve had two of these for approx. 3 months throughout a very chilly winter and loving every warm second of them. They’re holding strong thus far. Straps may need to be tied under the seat twice, but overall very happy with the quality. Definitely don’t forget to unplug them from your 12v port when the car isn’t running so it doesn’t drain your battery. There’s a built in failsafe feature which turns them off after 30 minutes - but I’m a bit skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the perfect seat warmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat warmer and fits perfectly in my Chevy Equinox. Yes, it costs a little more but trust me it’s worth it! I had a basic seat warmer in my car but it always shifted when I sat down. I was going to have seat warmers installed in my car and then I came across this one while shopping. This one was super easy to install, warms up in seconds, and DOES NOT SHIFT AROUND! It also looks great - much nicer than the basic seat warmer. I will update this review after a month and let you know what think of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Malsbury

customer_reviews.title: Look good but don’t keep it’s shape
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, drivers side has completely stretch and is out of sorts. Thought it would be easy to get in and out but it’s not. They look great and heat up but not holding it’s shape. It’s digital so if you remote start your car they won’t be on. They are also very cold when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They work, but I don't notice a temperature change in a minute or even in 5 minutes. They are slow to heat up. Maybe I got a deffective pair. Once they get going, they sure do get nice and hot. The controls are good. Timer is nice. Temp choice is nice. The look good when put in place. I am satisfied with the purchase, but I just wish they would actually heat up in less than 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Slainte

customer_reviews.title: I broke a sweat!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Unit displays temperature in Celsius, so "60" is 140 degrees F. You can feel warmth in 2 minutes...I actually broke a sweat with it set on 60! I use it for a 30 minute commute in 20 degree weather. I am hot at about 10 minutes. Because I am wearing a heavy coat, I don't feel the seat back heat as much unless I take my coat off. I should have bought this a long time ago!!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: NOT so Warm Seat in Winter
customer_reviews.text: DON'T waste your money. Have owned 2 units (bought 12 months apart) and they started having issues with the controller and blowing fuses regularly! Have gone thru a bag of 10 fuses to keep these working. It is always a surprise when it quits. I do nothing different and the next time I go to use the unit fuse blows. Company has been pretty good about responding but I just want whatever the problem is to stop. Presently have 4 controllers for 2 units and just blew another fuse and not even completely ( checked on multimeter ). Nice when they work but......... Considering these are only used part time for 7 months of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Frost

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this heated seat when it going to like 20 degrees the next morning. I go out and start my truck and turn on the seat. Thinking I was going to have a nice warm seat when I got ready to leave for work. When I got in to leave the seat was still cold. Picture shows heat throughout the seat and leg area. I only felt heat in the lower back area. I Returned the seat
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Breeden

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and the heat options but I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: By the looks of this product I thought the heat went all the way up to the headrest and that's why I bought it...but the heat actually stops short of the shoulder blades. it's also quite skinny at the seat and I'm a thin person and the outer parts of my legs are still cold. I like the look and the heat options but I bought this because I have shoulder pain and wanted it to reach my shoulders. Will most likely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a Christmas gift. I've been told by the recipient that the heated cushions work just fine. I purchased 2 individual cushions, but they are able to be connected together and plug into the vehicle using one plug. Not sure how long they'll last - we'll have to wait and see. For now, I'm sure they feel great on cold winter mornings.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the winter ******  BUT!!! Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome and easy to install, it shipped fast and it really helped my back without you not having to upgrade my whole vehicle seat to something really expensive !I love it! I bought this on Jan. 20,2020 and it stopped working on March 25 th about! I loved it until it stopped working for NO REASON>
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very skinny seat cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this cover and really liked the leather look of it when it arrived. I purchased it for my older car's leather seats to help keep warm but this skinny cover is about half the width of the seat, so more of a warming strip rather than a cover. I'm not a big person, size 6, sadly I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great when it actually worked.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a holiday gift as his new used car does not have a seat heater and his old one did. He loved the idea and was happy with it. However, it only worked for about three weeks. Then it didn't turn on. I returned for credit as I didn't want to get stuck again. The seat is decent looking and I had higher hopes for it. It did however bunch up on the seat a bit and was a little narrow for the seats in a Honda CRV. This one was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend! This is very thin and sleek that you would never even know you were sitting on anything! Very warm and can set to your own temperature. I love this and I am definitely buying another one for the passenger side! If you are a little bit reluctant to buy this, I highly assure you that it’s well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and does get warm fast
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking looks well made. Gets pleasantly warm fast on seat and lower back. Doesn't slide around. I wish it was a little wider on the seat portion. You do have to watch the fabric to make sure it does not crease on the top level, it could be creasing the heating element and that could be bad. I've used the seat warmer a couple weeks now and as of now very happy with purchase and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Butt coverage could be better
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! It's sleak looking, this and comfortable. I would totally give this a 5 star if only they have made the seat portion widder. I'm 5' 10" 180 lbs and my butt don't fit it. So on my cold wide leather truck seats, half of one cheak is hitting a cold spot.lol Other that that, it heats very fast, warming most your body. I love the auto shut off.
customer_reviews.author: allenj2191

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several heating pads from other manufacturers but returned them all. This one stays in place very well! Doesn't move or wrinkle. Heats up quickly and provides enough heat, even in worst conditions. I bought another one for my wife's car. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat heater!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat heater!!! I was picky because I wanted something smoother/thinner that would blend in with my leather seat & not really show. It doesn’t shift around/move on my seat either. I drive a Cadillac CTS and I can’t get my hands under my seat enough to attach the front clips but it doesn’t matter because it’s still not moving. It heats up hot too! I have fibromyalgia so I will be using this year round.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: It does put out some heat
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on 1996 diesel truck as the heater in the old diesel trucks doesn't work very well. It was easy to install. The instructions are not very good. They are translated from Chinese using a simple translate so it's English is broken and doesn't always make sense. It's pretty simple to install thou. It will make your seat uncomfortable. It does not stretch when you sit on it like a regular seat will so the seat will be quite firm. The heater part works well. On my old truck even with the truck running about 30 minutes it will drain the battery quite a bit. So be careful not to run your battery down to far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend uses it every drive. Her only minor complaint is that it shuts off after 30 minutes. !UPDATE! The cigarette lighter adapter crapped out after a couple months. The company replied that a replacement was in the mail, but after months, still nothing. LOOK ELSEWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Peck

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SLIP. Excellent product ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Does not slip when getting in and sitting in the car. Best seat heater I have purchased. Looks good, comfortable and most of all stays where it is. Others have to be constantly adjusted due to slippage. Just bought my husband one as I am very impressed with this purchase. A little more money but certainly worth it. Still a very low cost purchase . Excellent value and feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it just got cold here in Texas ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it just got cold here in Texas and this worked. Ordering one for the passenger side. The temps are in Celsius but I start at 60 then move to 35. warms up fully in 5 min or so about the same as my wife's honda builtin heater. Update 1/9/2018 cold winter here, these things keep working I really recommend them as an inexpensive retrofit to keep your old loved vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Ranchowner

customer_reviews.title: Typical Amazon product.  Just as represented.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in three days. Easy install.. Fast warm up. Nice and thin on the seat. Looks like it will be easy to clean as well. Multiple temperature settings. Kozy The seat heater in my 2008 Jeep had given up and the dealer wanted hundreds to fix it. $40 and 5 minutes and I'm done I assume that the temp settings are Celsius. They run from 30 to 60. Maybe they're relative settings. ?????? There is no explanation That's of no consequence since I just find a comfortable setting and go with it
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Made me a hero!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heated seat cushion for my wife to use in her Suburban. She loves it. We live in Alaska so having a heated seat to jump in is a game changer. Could be a bit wider, but overall it works as expected. Easy to install, but I did use two small zip ties to better secure it at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kachemak

customer_reviews.title: Very hot high temp
customer_reviews.text: Be careful this gets super HOT! I love that it goes all the way down to my calf while sitting in car but if it on high it’s definitely too hot and could cause some serious burns! Definitely worth the buy just be carefywith heat settings
customer_reviews.author: AAB

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me toasty
customer_reviews.text: This seat warmer is great! It is low profile, comfortable to sit on, not bumpy like some others. It has many heat settings at 3 degree Celsius increments, and can be barely warm or very hot! I also like that you can set it for 30, 60, or 90 minutes- more options than some. It grips my cloth seat on my truck pretty well. It does start to slide in a bit, but I only have to reposition it an inch or so, once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: This product's hand controller looks like it has been refurbished after being used.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, heated alright, and looks great. However 8 months after buying it, it is blowing fuses any time it's plugged in. If it doesn't blow the glass fuse inside the plug it then it pops the truck's fuse. Useless as of now; must have a short somewhere but the wires look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Warmth while driving!
customer_reviews.text: From the first time I used it, I love this product. I drive a '76 VW campervanthat doesn't have any functioning heat. So having this heated seat pad makes a huge difference. Not only is it comfortable and warm, it has a non-slip backing, so it stays in place on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Playbent

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat like a heating pad, weak
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a heating pad style of heat because you have back problems this is not for you. The heat dissipates with the leather like material it’s made of. The only thing this is suitable for is heated seats for northern winters.
customer_reviews.author: DGPayne02

customer_reviews.title: Everything I love about the heated seat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got four blown disc in my lower back and two in my neck so I have a lot of back pain I absolutely love this heated seat I do not currently have heated seats in my car but my daughter dies and when I get in her car I take this with me because it works so much better than a heated seat I really wish it had a plug for the house If you get it get the warranty it stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.author: Virginia peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it cost.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this ~5 months now. It works, e.g heats up, fine, but it doesn't stay put. A bungee cord around the seat helps. The first month or so it was better. now the bottom portion has rolled up on the left side from getting in & out. It does make the back happier on 500 mile road trips, so not a total waste. Not too bad for a $40 seat heater. It might just get relegated to the back seat for the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This seat warmer feels great and doesn't shift as you get in and out of your vehicle - My only complaint - the 12V cord is inches long - and the control cable is pretty short as well. I had to get a 12V extension cable to plug this in to the backseat power in my truck - the closest power - it wouldn't go past front edge of the seat to use the dash plug.
customer_reviews.author: Dan West

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these last year which worked great through the season. They warm up quickly and are super low profile and comfortable. I installed them again this year when the weather was getting cooler and one didn't work - showed an error code. I reached out to the company who gave me a hefty discount code to purchase a replacement. Since it had been a year since they were purchased, I was happy with that. The new one works perfectly and I have warm seats again :)
customer_reviews.author: Ellebelle24

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not impressed. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great up until about the 5 month mark. Having not used it that much considering it was mostly summer, I would have expected it to last a lot longer. It hadn’t been used much, went to plug it it, flipped the switch and boom, it blew. And now unfortunately the return date has expired and I have no way to receive a refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: holly bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: This works great and is easy to use. I can’t attach it to the front of my seat so it hangs down a little but it doesn’t get in the way. Excellent amount of heat and added comfort to my Rav 4 which has sort of hard seats.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: defective, barely got warm
customer_reviews.text: After turning on for 15 minutes on the highest setting (60), only a few spots got mildly warm (to the hand). item is defective. i viewed other reviews that were favorable so i am hoping that my product was a one time issue. have a good day folks
customer_reviews.author: scott lawson

customer_reviews.title: Loved Initially, Now Don't Work and Are Loose...
customer_reviews.text: Initially liked these, but one has stopped working after about 3 months and a dozen uses. Keep blowing fuses. They wrinkle over themselves real easy in the butt zone and get annoying to sit on. Also, hooks come undone and make the whole cover loose. Wish I could get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: OBX

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: The seat warmer works well. I couldn’t figure out how to use the little hooks to hold the bottom of the seat warmer to the bottom of the seat, but you don’t really need to do that anyway. The instructions that come with the seat warmer have lots of grammatical errors. English wasn’t their strong suit, but you can figure out what they are trying to say. I love how quickly the seat warms up. Great to have in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: LTP

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Wish it wouldn't turn off every 10-15 min though!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST heater I've ever had! Looks Amazing and heats to **almost** too hot. The ONLY bad thing about it is it shuts off after about 10 -15minutes or so. So I keep having to turn it back on. Make it last longer, and I'll give you a 5* rating in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I think it would work better and last longer if the wire came out on ...
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the description as "Improved" I thought I'd give it a second chance. The one I purchased last year worked well few months then quit working. This is exactly the same seat warmer. I don't see any "Improved" about it. I wonder what they changed to make it "Improved". The biggest issue is where the wire comes out of it. It's right where you sit so it takes a beating. I think it would work better and last longer if the wire came out on the side of the warmer. Time will tell if this warmer last longer.
customer_reviews.author: St Louis Snacker

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, pleather cover was uncomfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a great alternative to buying actual heated car seats. It worked really well, and was warm within minutes of plugging it in. My car has cloth seats, and I found the pleather of these covers to be very uncomfortable. I’m a squirmy person and have a hour long commute one way, and this did not allow me to shift positions very easily. The cover worked great and did everything it was supposed to do. I’m returning it because it was uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one for my and she loved it. It worked better than my factory ones so I installed one in each of my cars. I also got one for my dads car and he loves it. Easy to install and feels good on a sore back, plus simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: J. McClinsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my Jeep!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't slide around, heats up quickly. The timer feature is handy for auto-shutoff. This works so well that my daughter stole it for her car and I had to purchase another one. Durability seems good. The heat goes both on the seat and high up the back which is a nice feature that a lot of competitors don't have.
customer_reviews.author: Annette D

customer_reviews.title: Kingleting Heated seat pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas gift for my wife and she really likes it. Its nice quality with a small wired remote. I wish the remote was back lit so you can see it in the dark. I took her car our to the store at night and couldn't see what the remote said so I didn't try it myself. For the price it's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sig Al

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and warm, and lasted the entire winter last year.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted an entire winter so far being used everyday. I hope to get at least another winter out of it. I see no reason why it won't continue to work, but if it quit, I would buy another one it is very warm and makes my wife much happier, sensor car did not come with heated seats.
customer_reviews.author: MR DAVID R HARE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. I was envious of my friends' new ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I was envious of my friends' new vehicles that all have heated seats. Bought this on a lark, thinking it wouldn't be as good and was wonderfully surprised. The pad heats up quick and keeps you snug in the coldest of weather. It also heats the area of my back that gives me pain and is wonderfully therapeutic. I would strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiranog

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for him for Christmas to keep him warm during a long commute. The ONLY complaint he had was that it is almost TOO comfy. :D It definitely helps ease those aches and pains at the end of a long work day, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Narrow width
customer_reviews.text: I really like this heated seat cushion. With winter here, I love getting my car started and the heated seat cushion preheated before I start driving.The material is strong and it stays in place despite the front hooks not staying in place. My only issue is I wish the cushion was wider, it is pretty narrow. But I do have to say, once it is heated up, I feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Furney

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Had this seat heater for a couple of months now, and it works exceptionally well! A cheap, quick fix by having this product, when my actual seat heater that is within my driver's seat had stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Surviving winter in style.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for long term durability as I've only had it a couple of weeks, but so far I love this thing. My current car (Hyundai Santa Fe) has cloth seats, so no built in seat warmers, but these are great, one of the best things I've bought for ages, it heats up very quickly and for me personally I think setting it past 40 something is way too hot, it doesn't shift around on my seat at all, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: skyhigh801

customer_reviews.title: I guess they are the next best thing to having built in heated seats
customer_reviews.text: I guess they are the next best thing to having built in heated seats. The heat level on high is very hot, I've even had to turn them down which is unusual for me. As others have said, having .cords a bit of a pain, and having to use the cigarette lighter is a drag. We bought a splitter which turned our cigarette lighter in to two as we use the cigarette lighter for lots of other things as well. The joys of having an older vehicle...
customer_reviews.author: 3Kidsmom

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems solid and is the closest thing to real leather that I've seen with a heated seat cover. It matches my black leather interior very well and the straps connecting to the headrest are invisible once they are hooked up. I make it a habit to unplug the connection from the vehicle prior to turning it off because of the horror stories I've read about it draining the battery. I hope this holds up well over time and would consider purchasing a second one if it does.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: One of the best upgrades to my 1997 JEEP TJ. Wish I bought this years ago. I purchased 2 and I’m able to have both on at the same time using cigarette lighter socket without blowing a fuse. Really warms up nice.
customer_reviews.author: rayaboomboom

customer_reviews.title: Best pad type option.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Tried a cheaper one first and it slid around, and drained my battery. This is well made, stays in place, and has a timer. Best option I've found short of taking s seats out and installing an OEM style unit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Vincent

customer_reviews.title: These really get good and hot! But then you can adjust them to any temp you want!
customer_reviews.text: These suckers really work, I bought 2. Much hotter than built-in seat heaters, but a little awkward to place and sit on, like all seat covers, but they really work well, and the controls allow quite a bit of adjustment. These are just the ticket if you like, or need heat on your back when driving.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: China product return back to hassle-free Amazon was the only option
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design and material but it was missing the connector that attached to the car lighter. It would have taken several weeks to get it from China so I took the option to send the product back to Amazon instead. Very disappointed. Went locally for an alternative with a 20% coupon. I wished it worked out. But according to reviews product may stop working in short time
customer_reviews.author: Drey B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..  would definitely recommend... 😊
customer_reviews.text: Great warmer.. warms fairly quickly, gets pretty warm as well. Nice and toasty. love the thin soft material. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the clips for the base aren't very well designed. Will probably end up using some sort of small bungee cord to secure the warmer underneath this car seat..
customer_reviews.author: C.L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED a pair of these as a gift this winter and it staved off her desire to have her car seats reupholstered with elements embedded in them. They’re attractive, lay flat against the seat, are made of a material that is neither too slick or too grippy and they put off plenty of heat to keep you cozy during cold drives into work and school.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I belive mine is a version 2.0 This is amazing. I got thos for my landrover. And looks very nice. Get hit fast. And the best thing is that it has two connectors to I output.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Buns
customer_reviews.text: Item seems to work well in toasting your buns on a cold winters day while you are waiting for the car heater to warm up. The quality seems good and doesn't get out of shape getting in and out. The timed setting are nice so that you don't forget and run your car battery down once you get to your destination.
customer_reviews.author: Ramblin

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit and installed it in my truck. I put it on my seat cover and it worked well, however, I wondered if it would work under the cover. I did that just that and was surprised. it not only worked the same but without a heat loss. this is a great item and I would purchase it again if the situation would arise. thank you Kingleting for a great product
customer_reviews.author: marine 1

customer_reviews.title: Next Best Thing to Actual Heated Seats
customer_reviews.text: True, it's chilly when you first sit on it BUT...plug it in, turn it on, and it's toasty within a minute or two. It fits in my 2002 Highlander like it was made to. You have to turn it back on each time you restart your car but that's a good safety feature and it really isn't a big deal. I think the only thing I'd change is bigger buttons on the controller so I don't have to take my gloves off to press them. Overall I'm really really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Bull

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast!
customer_reviews.text: This heated seat cover is awesome, my mom got one for Xmas and I liked it so much I got one for my car too!! It heats up very fast and I love how many different heat settings it has. I can make it a little warm or very warm depending how my back feels.
customer_reviews.author: Kyia Herlth

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more and get a 10x better one
customer_reviews.text: Being that it was the amazon choice, thought couldn't go wrong, took a long time to heat up, feels cheap, very thin no padding, can fell the heating part of it vibrating when heating made it less comfortable, I think it's a pos so now im giving it to my brother, and gonna buy a better one
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Pad is awesome, controller could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is thin compared to the others I see, it's comfortable, heats fast, looks great, and most importantly it stays put. I don't like the control, too hard to turn on with gloves. But that isn't stopping me from buying another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craig

customer_reviews.title: WARMS UP VERY QUICKLY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when my mom who is always cold rides in my van. She loves it. Easy to turn on , heats up fast and gets really hot. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: norrisbel

customer_reviews.title: Great butt warmer
customer_reviews.text: Wife was very pleased with these. So much that we bought her a second for the passenger seat. Color matched great on her gray seats. Only issue we ran into was with both seats set to high, it has pulled enough amps to burn out fuses, so keep an eye on them.
customer_reviews.author: Brad L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install. My only issue is the heat isn’t very evenly distributed and i wish it was more on my upper back than my lower back and legs. It was wonderful to have while on my lunch break and my back was sore.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ruth Latorre

customer_reviews.title: does not come with any fasteners, must use bungee cord to hold to seat
customer_reviews.text: Maybe package was returned by previous purchaser. It did not come with any straps to hold to seat. I had to hold with bungee straps.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, gets very warm and is very soothing. We were going to get the factory seat heater replaced, but decided to try this. So glad we did. It is much more effective than the factory heated seat.
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Great Customer Service!!!!! Great Warranty Service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year for the cold winter days. When I tried to use it again this year. It would not work. Controller just blinked. Contacted the company. They sent me a new controller immediately. It did not repair the problem. So they sent me another plug in adapter. And that fixed the problem and it is working great again. We really like this heater because it heats up right away. Not like other ones we had tried that take 10 minutes. Great warranty service after 11 months. Thank you again JTW
customer_reviews.author: J T Whitewater

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product, but
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a substitute replacement to the original heated seat that failed in my 2005 Buick LaSabre. Appears to be a very good quality product, but the plug for the cigarette light would not stay plugged in. A slight bump of the of the wire or plug and the plug will disconnect and the heated seat will turn off. Tried repeatedly in both the cigarette lighter and the auxiliary plug, but both work the same way. Product is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Hoepf

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it's very thin,and doesn't fill up the seat,like a cushion would.The heat is really warm after a minute or two,and so far has kept me warm on the coldest commutes.
customer_reviews.author: sm70

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Love how warm quickly it warms up & stays warm, dislike the fact that it moves a bit on the seat when you slide in (my vehicle is high up). I definitely recommend it! It’s been very helpful on my back & hips and keeps me cozy (it was -17 yesterday).
customer_reviews.author: married2abikeguy

customer_reviews.title: Sixteen Farenheit in Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Warmed to a noticeable level after 5 minutes at 16 degrees F. Perfect for my 13 minute nightly commute in the Rocky Mountains of Colorado. This thing works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for about 6 weeks when the plug fell apart. Really disappointed, because it was more comfortable and stayed in place better than other similar items I've tried, but way too much to pay for an item that lasted under two months with light use.
customer_reviews.author: llunarllama

customer_reviews.title: It worked and worked great. My bum and back was toasty and warm
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this heated seat, I was thrilled. It worked and worked great. My bum and back was toasty and warm. But now it's stopped working. It looks like it turns on. The red light glows, but there's no heat. Not worth the money for the little time it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Three Month Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this thing was great while it lasted. But it lasted exactly six months, and then just stopped warming up. I contacted KINGLETING and they stated that the product has a *three month* warranty. That's absolutely pitiful. If these seat warmer products are going to be a guaranteed waste of money, you may as well waste as little as possible and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Naughton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks, but only one out of two works
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these seat heaters. They look great and fit the seats in my RV really well. The heat distribution is nice and reaches low to mid back. But... only one of the heaters works, the others dials stay on 99 no matter what buttons I push. Need a little better quality control to make sure everything works before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rielle Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product.
customer_reviews.text: The product started out as 5 stars. Unfortunately the cushion no longer heats. The function started becoming sporadic as it would be on a short time then turn off, well before its time setting. Now I cannot get the seat to heat at all. The cushion is comfortable and does not slide on the leather seats. I am still using the cushion as it is a bit warmer than the seat itself.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klecka

customer_reviews.title: Best Seat warmer ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several seat warmers over the years and this is the best one yet! It heats up so fast that my seat is warm by the time I get to the end of my drive. And it can get hot... more so than any other seat warmer I've had. I use the 39 setting and that's plenty warm. My morning commute will be toasty all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mailie

product_meta.title: KINGLETING Heated Seat Cushion with Intelligent Temperature Controller.(12Volt,Black)
feature_bullets: FEEL THE HEAT IN 1 MIN - Kingleting heated seat cushion is outstanding in increasing the temperature quickly within 1min, providing cosy warmth for your full back, hips and thighs. The highest temperature is able to be adjusted to 60℃(140℉).
INTELLIGENT TEMPERATURE CONTROL - Our unique temperature controller makes you able to choose the temperature from 30 ℃(86℉) to 60 ℃(140℉) every 3 ℃(37.4℉) freely.

TIMING POWER-OFF PROTECTION - If you forget turn off the switch, don’t worry, this protection provides you with timing choices in every 30 minutes, 60 minutes or 90 minutes to avoid battery drain! Even if you don’t want the timing protection, feel free to choose “00” option!

SAFE & RELIABLE - For you safety, the heated seat cushion is equipped with a protection thermostat that keeps the cushion from overheated. When the temperature reaches what you chose, it will automatically stop increasing and constantly keep the temperature you want. Once the temperature gets lower, the heater will work automatically again to rise the heat up.

FIT UNIVERSALLY - The heated seat cushion nicely fits most standard types of cars, SUVs, and RV seats, designed with non-slip rubbers on the bottom, and equipped with elastic bands to fasten the cushion to the seat and keep it in place perfectly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,627 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
